msgSnippet: Here s a test that explicitly runs a sub-test-class:
messageBody:
Here's a test that explicitly runs a sub-test-class:
https://github.com/junit-team/junit/blob/master/src/test/java/org/junit/tests/experimental/theories/AssumingInTheoriesTest.java

Here's a hand-rolled mock:
https://github.com/junit-team/junit/blob/master/src/test/java/org/junit/tests/TestSystem.java

Hope this helps,

David
